title: League Client Sound issues
body:
My League of Legends client does not allow sound and neither does game, I have attempted full repairs, re-installing, my own computer settings (everything else on the computer has sound but league client and game), different headsets, different speakers, everything I could think of. Any Riot IT workers able to help solve this issue as it heavily affects gameplay when 1 of your senses just does not exist in-game.

Follow up when do you think the new client is rolling out to all, everyone I know has it but me, be appreciated with info on that too.
